notes: [Improved] Fuzzy search works on command descriptions as well.
[Improved] Updated fuzzy search engine.
[Improved] Option to rename the plugin in the settings.

[Fixed] Duplicating an Entry has been fixed. Relation data that did not have an active status was not copied. Matrix blocks received the same locale as the primary locale, on multi locale environments.
[Added] Commands can have icons now. The element search returns the corresponding icon, and the general commands have an icon now.
[Added] Change the palette to a theme of your choice. This can be changed in the settings, and currently we have the following themes: Default, Classic, Craft and Dark.

[Improved] Allows commands still be triggered while an element search is running the background. You now had to wait till the elements were returned before your could trigger a general command you'd already searched for and wanted to execute.
[Fixed] Combining commands (default and found commands by the element search) were not always merged correctly.
[Fixed] Only add the search criteria to commands found by the element search, if none of the characters were found.
[Improved] Display settings in a nicer way.
[Fixed] Install default plugin settings through a migration, regarding the element types used for the element search.
[Fixed] When search keywords were not found, display them in the command between brackets, when found by element search.
[Added] New command: New command: compare entry version. This command becomes available when you are viewing an entry in the CP.
[Added] New command: Create overview and detail section command. This will create a single with channel / structure for the detailed entry. Will create templates folder as well.
[Added] New command: Plugin settings. Quickly navigate to a plugin's settings.
[Added] New section and field commands.
[Added] Allow commands to be sorted in reversed order.
[Added] Allow commands to return HTML to be displayed.
[Improved] UI update.
[Improved] Renewed functionality of the palette. It works more like Alfred on Mac OS now.
[Improved] Shortcuts CMD / CTRL + 1 till 9 to quickly trigger a command.
[Improved] Redirect to entries section after deleting all entries from that section.
[Improved] Show the amount of entries on edit / delete commands in the command's description.
[Improved] Close palette when CMD + SHIFT + P is pressed again.
[Improved] Allow direct element search when no deeper command is executed.
[Improved] All commands are enabled from now on. You no longer can disable a command.
[Improved] Enable / disable certain Element Types for element searches, in the plugin's settings.
[Fixed] Fix searching when on a different locale.
[Fixed] Locale fix for the entry one is about to duplicate.
[Added] Added commands to manage tasks.
[Added] New command under tools to restart failed tasks.
[Added] Added functionality to set a return title through plugins.
[Fixed] Restoring to actions when pressing ESC in a sub command / action.
[Added] Added functionality to set return commands through plugins.
[Added] Added releases JSON.
[Added] Added plugin icons.
